questions.question:
What is the solution of the given system, when solved by Gaussian Elimination? 
 4x + 3y = 11 
 x - 3y= -1

explanations.a: On placing x=2 and y=1, the given system is satisfied
explanations.b: On placing x=1 and y=2, the given system is not satisfied

questions.question: Read the solutions by back substitution method:

explanations.a: The value of x and y is incorrect
explanations.b: The value of x and y is incorrect
explanations.c: The value of x and y is incorrect
explanations.d:
The correct values are 
 x = 2, y = -1, z = 3
